price: Dhugumatti, kana dura hin baqannu jechuun Rabbiif waadaa galanii turan. Waadaan Rabbii gaafatamaa ta’eera.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kānū ʿāhadū al-laha min qablu lā yuwallūna al-adbāra wakāna ʿahdu al-lahi masūlan
